s.l: Our time is running away like the waves which move towards the coast,
EeachEach place changes his outer look
when time by time hard work is done
Nativity was once in the main of light
and moves forward very slowly to maturity when he is crowned,
at the end of his life he goes with a crokked back,
his inheritage is confused by time.
and time searches for parallels in the beauty of your face;
time shows the rarities of the true nature and nothing stands
but he has to mow with his sickelsickle.
I hope that my verse shall stand in far away times,
to show my admiration for your worth, despite his cruel hand.
